name: Santa Dating Sim 2022
description:
You are at Santa's workshop for a date with Santa. What will ensue?

SEASON'S GREETINGS

Thank you for playing. My name is Amber, and I make narrative, choices-matter games that are glam, sassy, and existential. 

COME SAY HI

TOOLS & SOFTWARE

  • Game Engine: Godot
  • Dialog System: Custom dialog system in Godot
  • DAW: FL Studio
  • MIDI: Nektar 25
